summary: Two kittens go on a metaphysical journey on a magical railroad train.
cast: Mayumi Tanaka|Chika Sakamoto|Junko Hori|Ayumi Ishijo|Kaori Nakahara|Yoshie Shimamura|Shun Yashiro|Reiko Niimura|Chikao Ohtsuka|Hidehiro Kikuchi|Yuriko Fuchizaki|Tetsuya Kaji|Takeshi Aono|Seiji Kurasaki|Gorô Naya|Ryûnosuke Kaneda|Fujio Tokita|Amy Birnbaum|Scott Cargle|Crispin Freeman|Miyuki Ichijô|Tatsuyuki Jinnai|Rachael Lillis|Eric Moo|Lisa Ortiz|Scott Rayow|Sam Riegel|Ryûji Saikachi|Eric Schussler|Eric Stuart|Veronica Taylor|Greg Wolfe|Oliver Wyman
title: Ginga-tetsudô no yoru
